entry.title: WIND WARNING , Victoria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 07:00 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: W 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Showers beginning near noon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the water this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the water early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this evening then diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 03 February 2023
